name: Zig-Zag-Ping-Pong
description:
To launch: download, unzip, and open 'Zig-Zag-Ping-Pong.exe'.

--------------------------------------

For the 21st GDL Game Jam.

A variant of pong, where the player must move both paddles and choose when to zig-zag the ball in order to avoid obstacles. Obstacles will spawn as you play, getting larger and larger. Stay alive for as long as possible to earn points.

CONTROLS:

- Space bar to alternate the direction in which the ball zigs or zags.

- Arrow keys to move both the paddles.
